message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $180 is a bit too steep for me.  I'd be willing to pay $100 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $140?
I appreciate you coming down, Alice. How about we meet in the middle at $120? That seems fair.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I really need to make a profit. I'm willing to go a bit higher than $120, but I'm not going to go all the way to $140 again. How about we meet at $130?
